alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 11:30PM MDT until July 04 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Todd County in south central South Dakota... Central Tripp County in south central South Dakota... Eastern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1230 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Vivian to 8 miles southwest of 5 Mile Corner to 8 miles north of Mosher to near Fairgrounds Housing, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winner, Mission, White River, Rosebud, Okreek, Ideal, Wood, Carter, Mosher, Witten, Hamill, Soldier Creek, Ideal South Housing, Butte Creek, Swift Bear, Ring Thunder, Fairgrounds Housing, Antelope, Horse Creek and Hidden Timber. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
